sentence: Submitted information COLUMBUS — In honor of the life and legacy of Bluffton Police Officer Dominic Francis, Governor Mike DeWine has ordered that flags of the United States and the State of Ohio be flown at half-staff upon all public buildings and grounds throughout Allen and Hancock counties, the Ohio Statehouse, the Vern Riffe Center, and the Rhodes State Office Tower.
title: DeWine orders flags to fly at half-staff

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine has ordered that flags of the United States and the State of Ohio be flown at half-staff upon all public buildings and grounds throughout Allen and Hancock counties, the Ohio Statehouse, the Vern Riffe Center, and the Rhodes State Office Tower to honor Francis.
author: Joe Clark
title: Ohio officer hit and killed by fleeing suspects

sentence: pic.twitter.com/YkJkCX2gz6 — Governor Mike DeWine (@GovMikeDeWine) March 31, 2022 Ohio Governor Mike DeWine has ordered flags to half-staff until the day of Officer Francis' funeral.
author: Jack Crumley
title: UPDATE: Bluffton Police Officer Killed in the Line of Duty
